name: Flatwaters: The Curse of Echita
description: Flatwaters: The Curse of Echita is an open world game in which we will have to conquer each island of the city "Echita" and loot all the treasures in it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7-8-10 Processor: Intel Q8300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Gtx 460 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7-8-10 Processor: Intel Q9400 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Gtx 470 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
